sections.description: Shiprocket WooCommerce Integration provides real-time shipping rates and pincode serviceability check for your WooCommerce store using the official Shiprocket API.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.5

  • Added WordPress native update checker for automatic plugin updates
  • Enhanced settings page with API help and documentation
  • Improved user experience with quick action links
  • Better error handling and API response validation

Version 1.0.4

  • Updated to official Shiprocket API with API key authentication
  • Enhanced security by removing deprecated email/password authentication
  • Improved caching mechanism for better performance
  • Added comprehensive error handling and validation

upgrade_notice: Important update: Added WordPress native update checker for automatic plugin updates and enhanced API help section.
